AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Creeg Youth
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After struggling socially, [PAWN_nameDef] became enamoured with social ideaologies brought on by extremist propaganda.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rebellious Tinkerer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was mesmerized by war machines, ever-curious about how they work. [PAWN_pronoun] developed an incredible skill for maintaining and repairing all sorts of war-crime worthy things.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Northern Sergal
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the northern part of Vilous. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't able to rise above his rougher cohorts, and fell in line. [PAWN_pronoun] never grew out of it, unable to think for themself.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Terror Victim
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: During the great Avali plague, [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a colony that contained both Sergals and Avali when Creeg's virus hit. It left the colony crippled and [PAWN_nameDef] was lucky to get out of there alive, albeit influencing their ideals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Allergen Factory
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is allergic to women. That made for an interesting childhood, given the circumstances. [PAWN_nameDef]'s peers tried to weaponize this after finding out, which led to all sorts of fun experiments.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal colonypup
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a small trading post on the outer rims of the Sergal Empire that was constantly raided. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn to carry [PAWN_possessive] weight and try to keep the colony running.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal corepup
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on R4 in the Hamal Cluster. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in one of the many ringworlds, spending much of [PAWN_possessive] time in the upper-level saloons; mainly fighting.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal digger-kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always had a fascination with digging holes. Militant discovery of this unique behaviour lead to analysis and research, and much wasted time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal Steam Cleaner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in slavery and was quickly put to work, as children can fit into much smaller spaces to clean and construct. Able to befriend (and eat) local rats, [PAWN_nameDef] was lucky to get out; most times having to step over the corpses of [PAWN_possessive] other Sergal friends.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal Line Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive] calling in cooking. Take two parts ingrained hatred, add a dash of smarts, and [PAWN_nameDef] also found some skill in poisoning using oxygen. Who knew?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal Shovelclaw
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Thanks to childhood skill and a runaway Military budget, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to join the prestigious lower ranks of the Empire's fodder lines.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Terror Victim
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: During the great Avali plague, [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a colony that contained both Sergals and Avali when Creeg's virus hit. Luckily, the attack provided an excuse to slaughter anyone along the way out of the colony.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Toylord
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had a natural talent for making some very popular childrens' toys. [PAWN_pronoun] also found a way to make them detonate when tickled.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sex Slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by extremists and effectively broken. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to do all sorts of lewd acts for [PAWN_possessive] 'division'. Of course this also meant being kept away from weaponry and means of escape.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal lasminer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] operated a laser-mining rig at an advanced asteroidal mining station, and occasionally operated manual equipment when they'd pumped atmosphere into a particularly rich shaft. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to sabotage core equipment to maintain employment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Geneticist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bio scientist for the Sergal Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to unravelling the genome and improving [PAWN_possessive] race... FOR THE CREEG!

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional hunter. Sometimes called to put down manhunters, or guide rich dentists on Safari, [PAWN_possessive] skills as a tracker are only matched by [PAWN_possessive] skill at handling.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nivren breeder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent many years breeding Vilous wildlife, which for some reason requires special handling due to their rapid reproductive rate. This experience has given [PAWN_pronoun] a great deal of insight into certain animal behaviours, and questions such as "What is these animals?".

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trailblazer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is at the forefront of the effort to expand the Sergal Empire - rushing headlong into the unknown to colonize uncharted worlds and eke out a living. [PAWN_pronoun] took the name "Trailblazer" too literally.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Desk clerk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a clerk in an office, filing paperwork, submitting reports. During [PAWN_possessive] downtime, [PAWN_pronoun] would read and study various subjects on the global network through his workstation terminal. This left [PAWN_pronoun] with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has taken an oath to devote [PAWN_possessive] life to healing others. [PAWN_nameDef] also took a smaller, secondary oath of finding out what organs aren't needed to live.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal saucier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a saucier, a master chef who specializes in sauces, stews, hot hors d'œuvres, and sautés. [PAWN_pronoun] has helped prepare meals for some of the highest functionaries in Sergal society.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal pack alpha
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] bears the title of leadership among [PAWN_possessive] community. Sergal society has changed many times over the years, but the most recent leader - designated the Kerr - is among the more brutal of titles.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Army private
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rank-and-file soldier for the Sergal Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] had served [PAWN_possessive] term of service without incident.... until now.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Army Knight
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an officer for the Sergal Empire's army. [PAWN_pronoun] is responsible for the soldiers under [PAWN_possessive] command, and takes that duty seriously.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space trader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a free-trader, roving the Hamal Cluster and its neighbor's space searching for deals and opportunities for war profiteering. Until now, [PAWN_pronoun] was flying a ship, making deals with colonies like these... I wonder what happened?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: People Collector
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is something of a bounty hunter, often called "collectors" in the Hamal Cluster. Historians claim that this moniker comes from the act of collecting persons under the "I Arrest Your Bitch Ass" act. History aside, [PAWN_nameDef] is not to be taken lightly... or at all.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Assassin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has travelled through time to assassinate a specific target... [PAWN_pronoun] is fond of telling people that [PAWN_pronoun] will 'be back'. Most times, naked.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Retired Commando
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be one of the most elite soldiers in the Sergal empire. Now [PAWN_pronoun] is retired... though [PAWN_possessive] former commander is always trying to get [PAWN_pronoun] back. Some time ago, [PAWN_pronoun] had to take out a family member who was on the verge of terrorism. Scary stuff. [PAWN_pronoun] never forgave his former commander or his colleagues for not assisting in the terrorism.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Police Officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a 'lawman' in a dusty R-Type colony. [PAWN_possessive] preference for working alone and constant 'bending' of the rules earned [PAWN_pronoun] the nickname "Lonely Will Sieger". [PAWN_pronoun] ran afoul of some corrupt military officials running weapons to some drug-lords. Many bullets later, [PAWN_pronoun] ended up taking out the mastermind. And the drugs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal Barbarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured after a battle on a medieval world, and forced to train as a pit-fighter. After crushing [PAWN_possessive] enemies, seeing them driven before [PAWN_pronoun], and hearing the lamentation of their women, [PAWN_pronoun] was released from captivity. [PAWN_pronoun] now seems to be seeking 'Daijin Kuremkul' or something?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Army Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be one of the top Vilous special forces officers. Now [PAWN_pronoun]'s 'just' a cook... who can kill you nine different ways with just a pinky. [PAWN_pronoun] sometimes has knife-fights with Tommy-Lee Jones.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Full-On Doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born of a terrible background but managed to defeat the odds and become a renowned medical practitioner who has in particular made excellent progress in the field of robotics. And disassembly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sergal Slaver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] built a slave empire with brains, and more than a fair share of ruthlessness. [PAWN_pronoun] made a fortune, which attracted the attention of [PAWN_possessive] rivals, the dreaded Panstrumants Corporation. They struck [PAWN_possessive] main operation with merc raids and terrorist attacks. Now [PAWN_pronoun] is out for revenge...
